ITTABURU_MSG_000: ́Everyone! Follow that human! Do not allow it to leave this Bastille alive!
REC_POINT_01_2:
̄Part of a large Break Mutation device.
It appears to use Pure Darkonium.
REC_POINT_02_2:
̄Crystalized dark energy, which seems to be the main
fuel driving the device.
SYSTEM_MSG_000: It doesn't seem to go down to the 1st floor...
SAMAYOUYOROI_MSG_000:
̂Hey! The machine's in good order. Cap'n sent you up here to check on it, ya said... right?
ā
The meeting on the 1st floor's 'bout to begin. You can report this to the cap'n down there.
REACTER_MSG_000:
̄Uh-oh... an internal transmission within the Bastille
appears to be jamming all of our communication channels!
REACTER_MSG_010:
...Can you read me, ȁ?!
It's about time, I was starting to get worried.
ā
We need to find a safe place to meet up, where we
won't be in harms' way!
ā
Hmm, perhaps the 5th floor of the Bastille would suffice...
Yes, let us reconvene on the 5th floor!
REACTER_MSG_020:
̄Our channels are, once again, all being jammed.
However, I've traced the allied Reactor to the 5th floor.
ā
Let's follow its trail and meet up with whoever that was up on the 5th floor.
REACTER_MSG_001:
̄Overly hostile monsters have been detected near by.
Hide from them, and avoid confrontation for now.
ā
I've located an area on the 5th floor with low monster activity. You should seek this area out immediately.
ā
Move fast, be stealthy, and most of all... stay safe!
REC_NPC_GAIKOTU: ̄Minion of Itaburu, who is also one of the primary prison guards. Seems to not be "all with it".
REC_NPC_PRIZONER: ̄A Voodoo Doll from Alloy Park that has been infected with Darkonium and turned into a Break Monster.
